17:16 <vmassol> hmmm seems we've brought some regression in 7.1 regarding the default avatar image  
17:16 <vmassol> I had this code in an extension: $xwiki.getSkinFile('noavatar.png')  
17:16 <vmassol> and it generates /xwiki/skins/flamingo/noavatar.png  
17:16 <vmassol> but this resource doesn't exist anymore at least in 7.1.1  
17:17 <vmassol> evalica: any idea?  
17:21 <vmassol> seems we had it in colibri skin and it was removed or not added to the flamingo skin thus breaking extensions using it  
17:23 <vmassol> haha I see other extensons had the issue too: https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/application-forum/commit/3d3a99e5665265607a41d8ce04f38c6ebb8c2d7a  
17:23 <vmassol> they just updated without reporting the issue...  
17:24 <vmassol> reporting it, we can decide what we do  
17:28 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:30 <vmassol> created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12327  
17:30 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:04 <evalica> vmassol: I don't know - but good that you reported the issue - ty  
18:05 <vmassol> np

20:11 <cramm> has joined #xwiki  
20:15 <cramm> Hi all. I've installed 7.1.1 with the xwiki .deb packages on Debian + Tomcat 8 + openjdk7. no farm, just a single wiki. The theme/skin is flamingo. The proble we are seeing is in the wen UI: The drop down menus don't show after a click and the left side bar icons/glyphs for 'Blog', 'Dashboad', etc. show garbage inesetad that indicate the character is missing (FontASwesome afaik)  
20:16 <cramm> the browser dev console shows a bunch of CORS errors  
20:16 <cramm> ...related to webjars and the fontawesome webfont. I've been reading and trying to make some sense of XWIKI-12250, XWIKI-12251, XWIKI-12271 and XWIKI-12246  
20:17 <cramm> and even tried usign the  xwiki-platform-cors-7.1.1.jar as suggested in the last commet of the latter  
20:17 <cramm> All to no avail  
20:17 <cramm> Anyone seeing something similar?  
20:19 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
21:08 <evalica> cramm: have you tried to clear your cache? anyway … I don't think anyone is available at this hour. Sorry I can't help.  
21:09 <cramm> evalica: Hi, thanks for replying. What I've tried is to uninstall xwiki completely, drop the mysql database and starting anew  
21:10 <cramm> evalica: as I write this I'm realising perhaps there is a cache in tomcat I need to clean too? I'm a total n00b in java et al  
21:10 <evalica> I was talking more about your browser's cache  
21:11 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
21:11 <evalica> since you said you have problems with the menus and the icons.  
21:35 <OSIMasson> has quit  
22:10 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki

23:28 <evalica> cramm: but it might be a bug that needs reporting
